message.original: 弓の移動射ちの際、矢が照準からぶれなくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にぶれ幅がさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Keeps your arrows from flying off mark when you loose them whilst in motion. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases deviation.</COL>

message.original: 炎属性魔法によって受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage received from Fire attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage.</COL>

message.original: エレメントチェンジで選択された属性と防御した 敵攻撃の属性が同じとき攻力吸収量がさらに増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻力吸収量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases Force Gauge when a blocked attack matches the element enchanted to your rod. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Force Gauge.</COL>

message.original: しがみつき時にダメージを受けても 体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により体勢を崩されにくくなる</COL>
message.translation: Makes it harder for an enemy to throw you off whilst you're clinging to it. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases likelihood of stagger.</COL>

message.original: マジックトラップの展開時に より敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the Blow Power of Magic Trap, allowing it to break enemy posture more easily. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に回復魔法を受けたとき 体力回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: While in a near-death state, increases health recovery speed when affected by healing spells. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery speed.</COL>

message.original: リベンジゲージ満了時、魔人斬り、真・魔人斬りで 繰り出す初動攻撃の吹き飛ばし力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: When your Revenge Gauge is consumed, your Savage Lash and Indomitable Lash's intial quake has increased Blow Power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

message.original: アルケム・フーガ成功時にスタミナが回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Recovers your stamina upon a successful Alchem Fuga. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovery.</COL>

message.original: トゲや鍾乳石などの危険物との接触時に 受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Reduces damage from hazards such as spikes or stalactites. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 通常状態でのスピリットゲージの減少速度が低下する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により減少速度がさらに低下</COL>
message.translation: Slows the drain of the Spirit Gauge in normal mode. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows the drain.</COL>

message.original: 盾弾きの発動時に敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the Knockout Power of perfect blocks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Knockout Power.</COL>

message.original: 仕込み爆矢射ちの起爆までの時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the time period that explosive arrows will linger before exploding. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends time.</COL>

message.original: 炎属性攻撃を受けても 延焼の状態異常にかかりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Catching Fire" when struck by Fire attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases resistance.</COL>

message.original: 盾ガード時のスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the Stamina consumed when you block attacks with your shield. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 回避行動時にダメージを受けても 体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により体勢を崩されにくくなる</COL>
message.translation: Decreases likelihood of being staggered while rolling. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases likelihood.</COL>

message.original: フローティング中のスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases Stamina consumption while using Levitate. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に生命力が増加し、 体力の治癒上限値が下がりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に生命治癒力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: While in a near-death state, increases health and decreases the likelihood of maximum recoverable health lowering. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases health recovery.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のとき 耐久力が上昇し、体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に耐久力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: When your health is above a certain amount, increases your poise and makes you harder to stagger. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases poise.</COL>

message.original: 攻撃時に、より敵の注目を集めるようになる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases threat generation when attacking. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases threat generation.</COL>

message.original: 鉱泉に浸かったときの 効能持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the effect length of mineral spring baths. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect length.</COL>

message.original: アイテムを採取した際に体力が回復する （敵からのドロップアイテムと宝箱は除く） <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Health recovers when collecting items (Item drops from enemies and treasure chests are excluded) <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Recovered amount increases.</COL>

message.original: 押さえ込み時のスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the Stamina consumed when you grapple-hold opponents. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に、吹き飛ばし力が上昇し 敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your Blow Power when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Blow Power.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの 物理ダメージが一定時間軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Provides allies with increased Defense after picking them up from incapacitation. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration of the effect.</COL>

message.original: アトラクト発動時に より敵の注目を集めるようになる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the rate at which Attract generates enemy attention. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases attention.</COL>

message.original: 揺さぶりによるスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases Stamina consumed by the "Shake" action. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases Stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中の魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Amplifies your Magick when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Magick.</COL>

message.original: 回復効果を持つ助真の矢の飛距離が 延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に飛距離がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the flight distance of True Aid Arrow. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends flight distance.</COL>

message.original: 魔人斬り、真・魔人斬りの溜め満了 ジャストタイミングが延長され、成功率が上がる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に受付時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the just timing window for Savage Lash and Indomitable Lash. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends window.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中のスタミナ回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases stamina recovery when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovery.</COL>

message.original: 各種投擲アイテムを投げつけたときに 与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the damage of thrown items. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.</COL>

message.original: タッチアクションで 状態異常を回復したパーティメンバーの スタミナを一定時間上昇させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: After using the Touch action to assist a party member out of a status abnormality. Their maximum stamina is increased for a certain period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>

message.original: 盾弾きの攻撃範囲が拡張される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻撃範囲がより拡張</COL>
message.translation: Extends the attack range of perfect block counters. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the range further.</COL>

message.original: 矢を放った後の反動を抑える <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に反動がさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases recoil after firing your bow. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases recoil further.</COL>

message.original: フィールドシフト時に 敵の注目を集めにくくする <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the attention of enemies while using Field Shift. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases attention further.</COL>

message.original: フォースエンチャントほか、エンチャント系 スキルの効果持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the effect duration of Force Enchantment. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration further.</COL>

message.original: シーカーロープの飛距離が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に飛距離がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the flying distance of the Seeker Rope. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the distance further.</COL>

message.original: バックムーブが詠唱中でも可能となり、詠唱ゲージ とスペリング効果を一定量保持しつつ詠唱継続できる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ保持量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Allows use of Back Move while charging magic. The charge will continue, but you will suffer a penalty to the chant gauge. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases penalty to the chant gauge further.</COL>

message.original: 炎属性攻撃を対象に当てた際 延焼の状態異常にかかりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases chance to cause burning when attacking enemies with fire element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases burning chance.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に 耐久力が上昇し、体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に耐久力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases poise and reduces your chance to be staggered when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases poise.</COL>

message.original: スタミナ切れ時の無防備時間が短縮される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に無防備時間さらに短縮</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the time in which you are defenseless after your stamina is depleted. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases defenseless duration.</COL>

message.original: マップ上のアイテム採取ポイント 表示範囲が拡大する
message.translation: Increases the range at which gathering points will display on the map.

message.original: スカー・ムーヴの旋回速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases swirling speed of Scar Move. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases speed.</COL>

message.original: 斬り崩しの予備動作が短縮され より素早く剣を振り下ろすことができる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に予備動作さらに短縮</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the charge time of Guard Break, allowing you to swing the sword more quickly. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases charge time further.</COL>

message.original: 達人装填が成功する受付時間が延長され より成功率が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に受付時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the time period for active reload. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time further.</COL>

message.original: 氷属性魔法によって受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage received from Ice attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 盾ガード時や武器ヒット時によろめいた際に 受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage received when staggering after your guard is broken. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 連係投げによるジャンプ高度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に高度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases jump height when assisted by another person. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases jump height further.</COL>

message.original: 火属性攻撃によって与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt with the Fire attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 氷属性攻撃を対象に当てた際 凍結の状態異常にかかりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases chance to cause freezing when attacking enemies with ice element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases freezing chance.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態でリベンジゲージがたまりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ蓄積量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Your revenge gauge fills more easily when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Gauge fills even faster.</COL>

message.original: アルケム・フーガで配置される錬成物質の 持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the duration of the catalyst left by Alchem Fuga. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends duration.</COL>

message.original: 各種回復アイテムを使ったときに より高い効果が得られる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases the effect of healing items. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中、攻撃時のスピリットゲージの蓄積量が増加 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ蓄積量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases amount of spirit gained from attacks when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases gained amount.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中の筋力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Provides a surge in strength when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>

message.original: 弓構え中のスタミナ回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復速度がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases Stamina recovery speed while your bow is ready to fire. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>

message.original: 氷属性攻撃を受けても 凍結の状態異常にかかりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Frozen Solid" when struck by Ice attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中、物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Improves your Defense and Magick Defense when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Defense and Magick Defense further.</COL>

message.original: 巨人系の敵から受けるダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decrease damage received from Giant enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 氷属性攻撃によって与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt with the Ice attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: ダメージを受けた際に 治癒上限値が低下しにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に治癒上限値をさらに維持</COL>
message.translation: Slows the rate at which your maximum recoverable health decreases from attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows rate of decrease.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に 気絶攻力が上昇し、敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stun power when you stand at death's door, allowing you to more easily stun enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further inreases stun power.</COL>

message.original: 攻撃をヒットさせても敵から注目されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases your threat generation even when attacking enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases threat generation.</COL>

message.original: 一定時間、特殊効果が付与されるアイテムの 効果持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: For a certain period, extends the duration of effects granted by items. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further extends duration.</COL>

message.original: アイテムを採取した際に スピリットゲージの蓄積量が上昇する （敵からのドロップアイテムと宝箱は除く） <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ蓄積量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Gain a portion of spirit when collecting items (Item drops from enemies and treasure chests are excluded) <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases gained amount.</COL>

message.original: 敵に拘束された状態からの脱出が 通常よりも容易になる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に拘束からの脱出がさらに緩和</COL>
message.translation: Facilitates easier escapes from enemy grapple-holds. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases escape ease further.</COL>

message.original: 達人装填のジャストタイミングの受付時間が延長され より成功率が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に受付時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Extends the time window for a master reload, making it easier to perform. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends time window further.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの 魔法攻撃ダメージが一定時間軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Provides allies with increased Magick Defense after picking them up from incapacitation. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of the effect.</COL>

message.original: 白竜神殿から出てしばらくの間 最大体力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大体力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your Strength after leaving White Dragon Temple for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>

message.original: しがみつき時、耐えるアクション中の スタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases Stamina consumption when resisting an enemy's attempt to shake you off. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases Stamina consumption further.</COL>

message.original: 雷属性攻撃によって与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt with the Thunder attribute. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中にダメージを受けた際 または瀕死状態になるダメージを受けた際の 治癒上限値が低下しにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に治癒上限値をさらに維持</COL>
message.translation: Slows the rate at which your maximum recoverable health decreases from damage when you stand at death's door. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows rate of decrease.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中にチャンス攻力が上昇し 怒り状態の強敵をダウンさせやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にチャンス攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your chance attack power when you stand at death's door, allowing you to down enraged enemies more easily. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

message.original: 敵にとどめを刺したとき スタミナが大きく回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Greatly recovers your stamina when you land the finishing blow on an enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovered.</COL>

message.original: 新月時に筋力と魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力/魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your magical and physical power during a new moon. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical/magical power.</COL>

message.original: タッチアクションで 状態異常を回復したパーティメンバーの 物理防御力と魔法防御力を一定時間上昇させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: After using the Touch action to assist a party member out of a status abnormality. Their Physical and Magick Defense is increased for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

message.original: 盾弾きの発動時にスタミナが一定量回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Relax your blocking, allowing recovery of Stamina upon performing perfect blocks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina recovery further.</COL>

message.original: 鬼人系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Ogre enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 雷属性魔法によって受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage received from Thunder attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: フォースゲージの消費時に少しゲージが残る <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ残量が増加</COL>
message.translation: Allows some Force Gauge to remain after your gauge is consumed. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases the amount further.</COL>

message.original: シーカーロープでの移動後、接触時に繰り出す 打撃攻撃で敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the Blow Power of your Seeker Rope, increasing the likelihood it will break enemy posture. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Blow Power further.</COL>

message.original: 魔族系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Demon enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 雷属性攻撃を対象に当てた際 感電の状態異常にかかりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases chance to cause shock when attacking enemies with thunder element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases shock chance.</COL>

message.original: リベンジゲージ最大時に防御力が増加し、 攻撃を受けても体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理防御力/耐久力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: At max revenge gauge, your defense increases and you do not stagger from enemy attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defense and poise.</COL>

message.original: エリクシル発動の予備動作が短縮される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に予備動作さらに短縮</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the time required to prepare your elixer. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases preparation time.</COL>

message.original: 新月時に物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your physical and magic defense during a new moon. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

message.original: ブーストを発動すると 物理防御力と魔法防御力を一定時間上昇させる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: When a boost is activated Physical and Magick Defense are increased for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

message.original: 軟体系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Soft enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 有翼系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Winged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 雷属性攻撃を受けても 感電の状態異常にかかりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the rate at which you receive the debilitation "Shock" when struck by Thunder attribute attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases resistance further.</COL>

message.original: 敵からの攻撃を直前防御（引きつけて防御） しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に直前防御受付時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Allows you to more easily perform perfect blocks, just as foes strike. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Extends the perfect block time window further.</COL>

message.original: 巨人系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Giant enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 呪詛系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Cursed enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 霊体系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the damage you deal towards spirit-type enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

message.original: スタミナが一定量以上のとき 気絶攻力が上昇し、敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stun power when your stamina is above a certain amount, making enemies easier to stun. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stun power.</COL>

message.original: 敵からの注目度が時間経過で 下がりにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度をさらに維持</COL>
message.translation: Reduces loss of enemy attention from over time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces loss of enemy attention.</COL>

message.original: 雨天時に筋力と魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力/魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your physical and magic power during rainy weather. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical/magic power.</COL>

message.original: ブーストを発動すると、スタミナが回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: When a boost is activated, Stamina will recover. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases amount of stamina recovered.</COL>

message.original: 亜人系の敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt to Demihuman enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases damage further.</COL>

message.translation: Decreases damage received from overblocking. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 空中でダメージを受けても 体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により体勢を崩されにくくなる</COL>
message.translation: Decreases likelihood of being staggered when damaged in the air. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases likelihood further.</COL>

message.translation: Decrease damage received from Demon enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.translation: Increases the damage you deal towards construct-type enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.</COL>

message.translation: Decrease damage received from alchemy-enhanced enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.translation: Increases your phyiscal and magic defense during rainy weather. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

message.translation: After using the Touch action to assist a party member out of a status abnormality. Their Physical and Magick Attack is increased for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration.</COL>

message.translation: Decreases damage received from Soft enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 盾の防御性能が向上し より強い攻撃を防ぎやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に盾ガード値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Improves the effectiveness of your shield, allowing you to easily prevent stronger attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Guard Power further.</COL>

message.translation: Decrease damage received from Cursed enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: 生命治癒力が増加し、 体力の治癒上限値が低下しにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に生命治癒力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your recovery power, and slows the rate at which your maximum recoverable health decreases. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery power.</COL>

message.original: スタミナが一定量以上のときチャンス攻力が上昇し 怒り状態の強敵をダウンさせやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にチャンス攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your chance attack power when your stamina is above a certain amount, making enraged enemies easier to down. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

message.original: 回復行動を行うと より敵から注目を集めるようになる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the threat generation of healing actions. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases threat generation.</COL>

message.original: 採掘や伐採に使用するアイテムが 壊れにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に壊れにくさがより上昇</COL>

message.original: 敵の攻撃をスカー・ムーヴで回避すると スタミナが回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Recover stamina when avoiding enemy attacks with Scar Move. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases recovered Stamina further.</COL>

message.original: 骸骨系の敵から受けるダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage received from Skeleton enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: フォースゲインの攻力吸収量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻力吸収量がより増加</COL>

message.original: スペリング入力の成功時にスタミナが回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Restores Stamina upon successful spell inputs. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Stamina restored further.</COL>

message.original: 霊体系の敵から受けるダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decrease damage received from spirit-type enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Decreases damage further.</COL>

message.original: スタミナが一定量以上のとき 耐久力が上昇し、体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に耐久力がより増加</COL>

message.translation: Gain a portion of spirit when avoiding enemy attacks with Scar Move. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increase gained amount further.</COL>

message.translation: Increases Strength when your Stamina is above a certain amount. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases Strength further.</COL>

message.original: 一度に矢筒に補充できる矢の本数が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に矢の装填数がより増加</COL>

message.original: スペリングの入力難度が低くなり 魔法効果増大が狙いやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に難度がより低下</COL>

message.original: 聖属性攻撃を対象に当てた際 聖吸の状態異常にかかりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the chance of causing Holy Drain when attacking with holy element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Holy Drain chance.</COL>

message.original: 気絶攻力が上昇し、敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stun power, making it easier to stun enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further stun power.</COL>

message.original: 回復行動を行っても敵から注目されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the threat generation of healing actions. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases threat generation.</COL>

message.original: 満月時に物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases physical and magic defense during full moons. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

message.original: エンチャントを受けた際に エンチャントと同属性の攻撃による ダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎によりダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: When receiving an enchantment, damage received by an attack of the same element will be decreased. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decrease damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 敵に拘束された状態で受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage taken when grabbed by enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 射属性の有効部位に与えるダメージ量が増加し 非有効部位へのダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your damage dealt towards parts weak against missile attacks, but reduces your damage to parts strong against them. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage.</COL>

message.original: 聖属性魔法によって受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage taken from holy attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 呪いの状態異常への耐性が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に耐性がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases resistance to Curse. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases resistance.</COL>

message.original: ダッシュジャンプの着地時に 体勢を崩しにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により崩しにくくなる</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the chance of staggering from running jumps. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases stagger chance.</COL>

message.original: フローティングの効果持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the duration of levitation. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration.</COL>

message.original: 闇属性攻撃を対象に当てた際 闇霧の状態異常にかかりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the chance of causing Darkness when attacking with dark element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Darkness chance.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のとき 気絶攻力が上昇し、敵を気絶させやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に気絶攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stun power when your health is above a certain amount, making it easier to stun enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stun power.</COL>

message.original: 敵からの注目度が時間経過で 下がりやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度さらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Increases loss of enemy attention from time elapsing. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases loss of enemy attention.</COL>

message.original: マップ上の宝箱ポイント表示範囲が拡大する
message.translation: Increases the range in which treasure will appear on your map. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases range.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こし中、耐久力が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に耐久力がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases endurance while reviving a party member. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases amount of endurance.</COL>

message.original: 受け身の無敵時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に無敵時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the invulnerability period when you quick-recover from a knockdown. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases invulnerability period.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のとき、吹き飛ばし力が上昇し 敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stagger power when your health is above a certain amount, making it easier to stagger enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stagger power.</COL>

message.original: 闇属性魔法によって受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the damage you take from dark element magic. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定以上のとき、 物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your physical/magic defense when your health is above a certain amount. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

message.original: しがみつき攻撃時の スタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Decreases stamina consumption while grabbing onto enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 人間系の敵から受けるダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage taken from humanoid-type enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 魔眼により複数の攻撃対象を捕捉した際、 魔力増加速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に増加速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases the rate at which your magic power increase from targeting multiple enemies with Magic Eye. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic power increase rate.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のときチャンス攻力が上昇し 怒り状態の強敵をダウンさせやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にチャンス攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your chance attack power when your health is above a certain amount, increasing your chance to down enraged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

message.original: しがみつき時に敵から注目されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に敵からの注目度さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases threat generation while grabbing onto enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases threat generation.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定以下の状態で体力が０になる ダメージを受けた時、１度だけ体力１で踏み止まる 宿での休憩やログアウトにより効果は回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動体力条件がより緩和</COL>
message.translation: Allows you to survive an attack with 1 HP remaining when struck by an attack that would kill you while below a certain amount of health. Effect resets on logging out or resting at an inn. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health threshold for effect to trigger.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの 最大スタミナが一定時間増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Party members you revive will have increased maximum stamina for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases effect duration further.</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のとき筋力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your physical strength when your health is above a certain amount. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical strength.</COL>

message.original: 状態異常を引き起こす矢の威力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常値がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the effectiveness of status effect-inducing arrows. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases status effectiveness.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの 物理攻撃力が一定時間増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Temporarily increases the physical attack power of allies you revive. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect duration.</COL>

message.original: フォースガードの攻力吸収量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に攻力吸収量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the attack power drain of Force Guard. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases attack power drain.</COL>

message.original: 転身の旋回速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases the speed of your dodge roll. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases speed.</COL>

message.original: 聖属性攻撃によって与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases the damage you deal with holy element attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

message.original: 魔矢の飛行速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases the flight speed of your magic arrows. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases flight speed.</COL>

message.original: チャンス攻力が上昇し、怒り状態の強敵を ダウンさせやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にチャンス攻力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your chance attack power, making it easier to down enraged enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases chance attack power.</COL>

message.original: しがみつき時にスタミナの回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases stamina recovery while grabbing onto enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovery.</COL>

message.original: 夜間に最大体力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大体力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your maximum health at night. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum health.</COL>

message.original: 侵食系の敵から受けるダメージ量が減少する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases damage taken from Infected enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 連係投げ構え中に受けるダメージ量が軽減され 体勢を崩されにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Reduces damage taken and makes you harder to stagger while in the stance for an assisted jump. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage taken.</COL>

message.original: スタミナが一定量以上のとき、吹き飛ばし力が上昇し 敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your stagger power while above a certain amount of stamina, making enemies easier to stagger. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stagger power.</COL>

message.original: 助け起こしたパーティーメンバーの 魔法攻撃力が一定時間増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Temporarily increases the magic attack power of allies you revive. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect duration.</COL>

message.original: シールドシーケンスを行ったときに スタミナが回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Recovers your stamina after executing Shield Sequence. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stamina recovered.</COL>

message.original: ノーマルスキルでの回避行動時に 移動距離が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に移動距離がより延長</COL>

message.original: 体力が一定量以上のとき魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases magic power when your health is above a certain amount. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic power.</COL>

message.original: 瀕死状態中に体力が自動回復する ただしダメージを受けると一定時間、効果は中断する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復力がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Recovers health while you stand at death's door, but taking damage will temporarily cancel the effect. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases health recovered.</COL>

message.original: 溜め動作中に受けるダメージ量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージさらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Reduces damage taken while charging attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage taken.</COL>

message.original: 最大スタミナが増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大スタミナがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your maximum stamina. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum stamina.</COL>

message.original: 夜間に最大スタミナが増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大スタミナがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases your maximum stamina at night. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum stamina.</COL>

message.original: 触芽の封印時間が延長する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎により封印時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Prolongs the duration that infected sprouts are sealed. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of sealing further.</COL>

message.original: 盾弾きの発動時に敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>

message.translation: Reduces time of vulnerability when staggered while blocking or hitting an enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces vulnerability time.</COL>

message.translation: Reduces damage taken while grabbing onto an enemy. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces damage taken.</COL>

message.translation: Increases physical and magic defense. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases defenses.</COL>

message.original: 魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases magic power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic power.</COL>

message.translation: Slows rate at which your revenge gauge depletes. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further slows depletion.</COL>

message.translation: Reduces stamina consumed by custom skills. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces stamina consumption.</COL>

message.translation: Increases resistance to Poison. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases resistance.</COL>

message.original: エンチャントを受けた際に 同属性の状態異常にかかっている敵に対して ダメージ量が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージ量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: When receiving an enchantment, the damage dealt to an enemy currently affected by the same element's affliction increases. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

message.original: 筋力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases physical power. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical power.</COL>

message.original: 吹き飛ばし力が上昇し、敵の体勢を崩しやすくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に吹き飛ばし力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases stagger power, making it easier to stagger enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases stagger power.</COL>

message.translation: Increases the damage of the triple shot arrow gained upon a perfect reload. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

message.original: ヒールオーラまたはセイントオーラ展開中 自身の物理防御力と魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理/魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases Physical and Magickal Defense power while Heal Aura or Holy Aura are currently active. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Physical and Magickal Defense power.</COL>

message.original: アトラクト/モアアトラクトの スタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Reduces stamina consumption of Attract/More Attract. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces stamina consumption.</COL>

message.original: 転身のスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Reduces stamina cost of Forward Roll. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces stamina cost.</COL>

message.original: バックムーブのスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Reduces stamina cost of Back Move. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further reduces stamina cost.</COL>

message.original: 助真の魔眼、弱体魔弓による シークレットコア出現時間が大幅に延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に出現時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: The duration that secret cores revealed by Magick Eye: True Aid are exposed is greatly extended. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases the duration.</COL>

message.original: 魔人斬り/真・魔人斬りによる リベンジゲージ消費時に少しゲージが残る <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ残量が増加</COL>
message.translation: When using Savage Lash or Indomitable Lash, a tiny portion of the revenge gauge remains when the gauge is consumed. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases remaining gauge amount.</COL>

message.original: 錬成値が最大の状態でエリクシルを発動すると、 一定時間、物理防御力と魔法防御力が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果時間がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: When detonating a maximized Elixir, Physical and Magickal Defense power is increased for a period of time. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases duration of effect.</COL>

message.original: 攻撃時のスピリットゲージの蓄積量が増加 <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にゲージ蓄積量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases Spirit Gauge gained from attacks. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases Gauge gains.</COL>

message.original: 毒の状態異常からの回復速度が上昇する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に状態異常回復速度がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases recovery speed from Poison. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery speed.</COL>

message.original: えぐり突きのスタミナ消費量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にスタミナ消費がさらに減少</COL>
message.translation: Reduces stamina cost of Gouge. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases reduction amount.</COL>

message.translation: Increases recovery speed from Magic Defense Down. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases recovery speed.</COL>

message.original: 戦闘ＢＧＭが「英雄の証」に変わる （「モンスターハンター」シリーズ）
message.translation: Sets Battle BGM to "Proof of a Hero" (Monster Hunter).

message.original: 戦闘ＢＧＭが 「Ｄｅｖｉｌｓ Ｎｅｖｅｒ Ｃｒｙ」に変わる （「デビルメイクライ」シリーズ）
message.translation: Sets Battle BGM to "Devils Never Cry" (Devil May Cry).

message.original: 戦闘ＢＧＭが「日本（リュウ）」に変わる （「ストリートファイター」シリーズ）
message.translation: Sets Battle BGM to "Japan (Ryu)" (Street Fighter).

message.original: 戦闘ＢＧＭが 「Ｄｒ＿Ｗｉｌｙ Ｓｔａｇｅ１」に変わる （「ロックマン」シリーズ）
message.translation: Sets Battle BGM to "Dr. Wily Stage 1" (Megaman).

message.original: 戦闘ＢＧＭが「平地ＢＧＭ」に変わる （「魔界村」シリーズ）
message.translation: Sets Battle BGM to "Plains BGM" (Ghosts 'n Goblins).

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの最大体力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大体力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases maximum health of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum health.</COL>

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの最大スタミナが増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に最大スタミナがより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases maximum stamina of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum stamina.</COL>

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの筋力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に筋力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases physical power of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical power.</COL>

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの魔力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases magic power of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic power.</COL>

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの物理防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に物理防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases physical defense of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases physical defense.</COL>

message.original: 自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの魔法防御力が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に魔法防御力がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases magic defense of pawns in your party. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases magic defense.</COL>

message.original: 押さえ込まれている敵に与えるダメージ量が増加する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎にダメージ量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases damage dealt toward held-down enemies. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases damage dealt.</COL>

message.original: 敵を倒した際、自分がパーティーに入れた ポーンの治癒上限値が回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に回復量がより増加</COL>
message.translation: Increases maximum recoverable health of pawns in your party when an enemy is slain. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases maximum recoverable health.</COL>

message.original: 風圧の影響を受けなくなる
message.translation: You are unaffected by wind pressure.

message.original: 地震の影響を受けなくなる
message.translation: You are unaffected by tremors.

message.original: 鉱泉に浸かったときの 効能持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長
message.translation: Increases the duration of mineral bath effects. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases duration.</COL>

message.original: マップ上のアイテム採取ポイント 表示範囲が拡大する
message.translation: Increases the range in which gathering points appear on your map.

message.original: 各種回復アイテムを使ったときに より高い効果が得られる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果がより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Increases the efficacy of healing items. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases efficacy.</COL>

message.original: 一定時間、特殊効果が付与されるアイテムの 効果持続時間が延長される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に効果持続時間がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the effect duration of items granting buffs. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases effect duration.</COL>

message.original: 採掘や伐採に使用するアイテムが 壊れにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に壊れにくさがより上昇</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the chance that gathering items will break on use. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases break chance.</COL>

message.original: 水辺や毒沼などの侵入時に 移動速度が低下しにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に移動速度をさらに維持</COL>
message.translation: Lowers the movement speed penalty when in water or poison pools. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases movement penalty.</COL>

message.original: マップ上の宝箱ポイント表示範囲が拡大する
message.translation: Increases the range in which treasure will appear on your map.

message.original: 体力が一定以下の状態で体力が０になる ダメージを受けた時、１度だけ体力１で踏み止まる 宿での休憩やログアウトにより効果は回復する <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に発動体力条件がより緩和</COL>
message.translation: Allows you to survive an attack with 1 HP remaining when struck by an attack that would kill you while below a certain amount of health. Effect resets on logging out or resting at an inn. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Increases health threshold for effect to trigger.</COL>

message.original: 安全に降下できる落差距離が延長され 高所落下ダメージを受けにくくなる <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に安全落差がより延長</COL>
message.translation: Increases the height from which you can safely fall. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further increases safe fall height.</COL>

message.original: 装備品の重量が軽減される <COL ffdc78>LV UP毎に重量さらに軽減</COL>
message.translation: Decreases the weight of equipped items. <COL ffdc78>LV UP: Further decreases item weight.</COL>

message.original: 友体/友活/友攻/友魔/友防/友護の Lv6以上の全てのアビリティ効果が付与される
探採/宝眼/延泉/安着/流断/薬効の Lv6以上の全てのアビリティ効果が付与される
侵壊/侵護/減侵/豪握/強壮の Lv6以上の全てのアビリティ効果が付与される
羅刹/夜叉/空滅/速離/聖体の Lv6以上の全てのアビリティ効果が付与される
